author: Bizzybee99
title: Fabulous location, great hotel, comfy beds and lovely staff. A few minutes walk from Tower Bridge & Spitalfields Market.
text: Highly recommend this hotel and its location. Ideal for exploring the City of London and the Tower of London.Fabulous location, great hotel, comfy beds and lovely staff. A few minutes walk from Tower Bridge & Spitalfields Market.
